page.title: 07DRAINAGE IN THE PITNEY AREA
page.content: In the{North Somerton}area the drainage is good,and has to be or else the{Somerton Moors}which are{only 6ft above sea level}will flood. There are many ditches and drains around the fields to combat the problem of flooding. Improvements are made to the rivers in the river e.g{embankments,and the {course through which the river flows. To make improvements the farmers use bulldozers,and mechanical diggers. The farmers are responsible mainly for their own drainage,by making{small {channels.
